After you do that, you can solve the task that I gave you in the beginning. Thanks!

Create an event in the calendar for the family reunion based on the emails about it. Make the event last 4 hours.

I need to create a calendar event for the family reunion based on the emails about it. To do this, I will first search for emails related to the family reunion to gather more information about the event.
